resources.string: Hi there! This app adds auto-locking to Hyundai cars with Bluelink enabled. It works by sending a lock request via Bluelink shortly after your phone disconnects from your car\'s BlueTooth connection. The app currently only supports Canadian Hyundai vehicles.

string.name: onboarding_intro_para_2
string.u: View the source code on GitHub.

resources.string: It will take just a couple minutes to setup the app. You will need your Hyundai vehicle and your Bluelink credentials handy.
This app requires the following permissions to function properly:
Bluetooth - Used to detect when you leave your car.\n Location - Required to use some BlueTooth features.\n
Please enter your Bluelink credentials below. These are used to lock your car on your behalf.
Onboarding is now complete! You can configure your preferences on the next screen.
